symptoms: White powdery growth on leaves and fruits
recommended_treatment: Apply wettable sulfur (2g/L) or potassium bicarbonate spray.
additional_notes: Prune affected branches and ensure proper sunlight exposure.

symptoms: Orange-brown pustules on leaves and stems
recommended_treatment: Spray with Mancozeb (0.25%) or Azoxystrobin.
additional_notes: Improve airflow and remove fallen leaves.

symptoms: White powdery spots on leaves and stems
recommended_treatment: Use triadimefon (0.1%) or sulfur dusting.
additional_notes: Plant resistant varieties and avoid excessive nitrogen fertilizers.

symptoms: Reddish-brown or black pustules on leaves
recommended_treatment: Apply Propiconazole (0.1%) or Tebuconazole spray.
additional_notes: Remove infected plants and rotate crops.

symptoms: White powdery growth on leaves and stems
recommended_treatment: Spray with potassium bicarbonate solution or sulfur-based fungicides.
additional_notes: Ensure proper spacing and ventilation in the crop field.

symptoms: Rusty-brown spots on leaves and stems
recommended_treatment: Use copper-based fungicides like copper oxychloride (0.3%).
additional_notes: Avoid overhead irrigation and remove infected leaves.

symptoms: Specific symptoms of Powdery Mildew seen in Chili.
recommended_treatment: Spray with neem oil or organic sulfur solution tailored for Chili.
additional_notes: Ensure optimal conditions to prevent Chili-specific powdery mildew.

symptoms: Rust-like symptoms observed in Chili.
recommended_treatment: Use copper fungicides or Propiconazole specifically tested for Chili.
additional_notes: Monitor and apply treatments designed for Chili rust disease.
